message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60%, you get 40%.  What do you say?
I think 55-45 is more fair considering the inflation hits me harder.
Okay, I'll meet you halfway. Let's split it 52.5/47.5.  This way we both get a little more than our previous offers.
Considering I've lost almost 20% of the value, I need a bigger share. This is my final offer before I start losing too much.
